name: A fan made game for Sam hogan
name_original: A fan made game for Sam hogan
description:
This game is made for Sam Hogan with love from the bottom of our hearts. Hope this  game is worthy of being loved by a great developer

And also this is my first game . This took me 1 week to make. I don't know coding that much and haven't done any art in my life. This is my first project and i want to make this for Sam. His video motivated me to make games . So , I make one
